column4: anyhow.. as I was saying.  I cannot honestly see how anyone who's used macos for very long as a primary desktop could despise it.  It's simple and gets out of your way.  Take away the obvious technical deficienies behind the scenes and you have a really top-notch UI with 20 years of research behind it.
thats offtopic for this channel, please take it to #ubuntu-offtopic
ok, ok.. throw my sarcasm back at me.  it's 4am and I'm tired :)
